verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; to כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki When תָבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo-'u, unto them When ye be come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz into the land מוֹשְׁבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4186><s%> mo-she-Vo-tei-Chem, of your habitations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten which I give לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-si-Tem And will make אִשֶּׁ֤ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh an offering by fire לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD עֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah a burnt offering אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or זֶ֔בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach, or a sacrifice לְפַלֵּא־ <S%H6381><s%> le-fal-le- in performing נֶ֙דֶר֙ <S%H5088><s%> ne-der a vow א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בִנְדָבָ֔ה <S%H5071><s%> vin-da-Vah, or in a freewill offering א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בְּמֹעֲדֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4150><s%> be-mo-'a-dei-Chem; or in your solemn feasts לַעֲשׂ֞וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to make רֵ֤יחַ <S%H7381><s%> Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> hab-ba-Kar of the herd א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon. or of the flock

וְהִקְרִ֛יב <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-Riv Then shall he that offereth הַמַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> ham-mak-Riv bring קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <S%H7133><s%> ka-re-ba-No his offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah a meat offering סֹ֣לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let of flour עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <S%H6241><s%> is-sa-Ron, of a tenth deal בָּל֕וּל <S%H1101><s%> ba-Lul mingled בִּרְבִעִ֥ית <S%H7243><s%> bir-vi-'It with the fourth הַהִ֖ין <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin [part] of an hin שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> Sha-men. of oil

וְיַ֤יִן <S%H3196><s%> ve-Ya-yin of wine לַנֶּ֙סֶךְ֙ <S%H5262><s%> lan-Ne-sech for a drink offering רְבִיעִ֣ית <S%H7243><s%> re-vi-'It And the fourth הַהִ֔ין <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin, [part] of an hin תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou prepare עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah with the burnt offering א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or לַזָּ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> laz-Za-vach; or sacrifice לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad. for one

א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> o Or לָאַ֙יִל֙ <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil Or for a ram תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh thou shalt prepare מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah, [for] a meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let of flour שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֑ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim; tenth deals בְּלוּלָ֥ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-She-men of oil שְׁלִשִׁ֥ית <S%H7992><s%> she-li-Shit with the third הַהִֽין׃ <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin. [part] of an hin

וְיַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> ve-Ya-yin of wine לַנֶּ֖סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> lan-Ne-sech And for a drink offering שְׁלִשִׁ֣ית <S%H7992><s%> she-li-Shit the third הַהִ֑ין <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin; [part] of an hin תַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> tak-Riv thou shalt offer רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> rei-ach- savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach [for] a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- When תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh And when thou preparest בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- afflicted בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar bull עֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah [for] a burnt offering אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or זָ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> Za-vach; or [for] a sacrifice לְפַלֵּא־ <S%H6381><s%> le-fal-le- in performing נֶ֥דֶר <S%H5088><s%> Ne-der a vow אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or שְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mim or peace offerings לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וְהִקְרִ֤יב <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-Riv Then shall he bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- afflicted הַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> hab-ba-Kar bull מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> min-Chah, a meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let of flour שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah of three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֑ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim; tenth deals בָּל֥וּל <S%H1101><s%> ba-Lul mingled בַּשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> bash-She-men of oil חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi with half הַהִֽין׃ <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin. an hin

וְיַ֛יִן <S%H3196><s%> ve-Ya-yin of wine תַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> tak-Riv And thou shalt bring לַנֶּ֖סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> lan-Ne-sech for a drink offering חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi half הַהִ֑ין <S%H1969><s%> ha-Hin; an hin אִשֵּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh [for] an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> rei-ach- savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

כָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> Ka-chah Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> ye-'a-Seh, Thus shall it be done לַשּׁוֹר֙ <S%H7794><s%> lash-shOr bullock הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad, for one א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or לָאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil ram הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad; or for one אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or לַשֶּׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> las-Seh lambs בַכְּבָשִׂ֖ים <S%H3532><s%> vak-ke-va-Sim of the male א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בָעִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> va-'iz-Zim. or a kid

כַּמִּסְפָּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> kam-mis-Par According to the number אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su; that ye shall prepare כָּ֛כָה <S%H3602><s%> Ka-chah so תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su shall ye do לָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> la-'e-Chad to every one כְּמִסְפָּרָֽם׃ <S%H4557><s%> ke-mis-pa-Ram. according to their number

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All הָאֶזְרָ֥ח <S%H249><s%> ha-'ez-Rach All that are born of the country יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-seh- shall do כָּ֖כָה <S%H3602><s%> Ka-chah this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh; these לְהַקְרִ֛יב <S%H7126><s%> le-hak-Riv these things after this manner in offering אִשֵּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> rei-ach- savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach of a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- If יָגוּר֩ <S%H1481><s%> ya-Gur sojourn אִתְּכֶ֨ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem for גֵּ֜ר <S%H1616><s%> ger And if a stranger א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בְּתֽוֹכְכֶם֙ <S%H8432><s%> be-toch-Chem with you or whosoever [be] among לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> le-do-Ro-tei-Chem, you in your generations וְעָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Sah and will offer אִשֵּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> rei-ach- savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach of a sweet לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher who תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su as ye do כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh. so he shall do

הַקָּהָ֕ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal [shall be both] for you of the congregation חֻקָּ֥ה <S%H2708><s%> chuk-Kah ordinance אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat One לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem וְלַגֵּ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> ve-lag-Ger and also for the stranger הַגָּ֑ר <S%H1481><s%> hag-Gar; that sojourneth חֻקַּ֤ת <S%H2708><s%> chuk-Kat [with you] an ordinance עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam for ever לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> le-do-Ro-tei-Chem, in your generations כָּכֶ֛ם ka-Chem כַּגֵּ֥ר <S%H1616><s%> kag-Ger as ye [are] so shall the stranger יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei be before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

תּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> to-Rah law אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat One וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-Pat manner אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad and one יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; וְלַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> ve-lag-Ger shall be for you and for the stranger הַגָּ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> hag-Gar that sojourneth אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem. for פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem; to בְּבֹֽאֲכֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'a-Chem unto them When ye come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, into the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi whither I bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. in it

וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become בַּאֲכָלְכֶ֖ם <S%H398><s%> ba-'a-cha-le-Chem Then it shall be that when ye eat מִלֶּ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> mil-Le-chem of the bread הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the land תָּרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> ta-Ri-mu ye shall offer up תְרוּמָ֖ה <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mah an heave offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

רֵאשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> re-Shit of the first עֲרִסֹ֣תֵכֶ֔ם <S%H6182><s%> 'a-ri-So-te-Chem, of your dough חַלָּ֖ה <S%H2471><s%> chal-Lah a cake תָּרִ֣ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> ta-Ri-mu Ye shall offer up תְרוּמָ֑ה <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mah; [for] an heave offering כִּתְרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> kit-ru-Mat as [ye do] the heave offering גֹּ֔רֶן <S%H1637><s%> Go-ren, of the threshingfloor כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so תָּרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> ta-Ri-mu so shall ye heave אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah.

מֵרֵאשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> me-re-Shit Of the first עֲרִסֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6182><s%> 'a-ri-So-tei-Chem, of your dough תִּתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Nu ye shall give לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD תְּרוּמָ֑ה <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mah; an heave offering לְדֹרֹ֖תֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> le-do-Ro-tei-Chem. in your generations ס sa-Mek
